app.title: 希伯来语字母河
app.tagline: 流动、学习并庆祝每一次捕获。

languagePicker.label: 应用程序语言
languagePicker.onboardingSubtitle: 选择您想要练习的界面语言和字母表。

practicePicker.label: 练习语言
practicePicker.helper: 选择您想要探索的语言包。

footer.resetNotice: 重置时间为每天 00:00 亚洲/耶路撒冷。

hero.heading: Choose your river adventure.
hero.description: Start with single letters or dive into full words.

letters.title: Letter River
letters.description: Catch drifting letters and drop them into the right buckets.

words.title: Word River
words.description: Assemble full words and match them to their meanings.

languagePicker.label: 练习语言
languagePicker.helper: 随时切换以使用另一个脚本进行训练。

setup.title: 希伯来语字母河
setup.subtitleFallback: 把移动的{{noun}}拖到正确的方框！
setup.prompt: 选择你想要练习的内容：

vowels1.label: “A”和“O”元音
vowels1.description: 练习 Patach 和 Holam 元音标记。

vowels2.label: “E”和“I”元音
vowels2.description: 练习 Segol 和 Hirik 元音标记。

expert.label: 专家模式
expert.description: 混合字母和元音以获得额外的挑战。

hiragana.label: 平假名
hiragana.description: 练习基本的平假名字符。

summary.heading: 遇到的物品
summary.empty: 本轮没有可显示的统计数据。
summary.weakestLinkDescription: 下次重点关注这个项目。

achievements.title: 成就
achievements.description: 推进每一层以收集星星。每一个里程碑都会为您沿着希伯来字母河顺流而下的旅程提供动力。
achievements.maxed: 完全掌握徽章——享受光芒！

learn.title: 学习
learn.intro: 深入学习精心策划的课程来掌握每个字母。新的学习模块即将在这里出现！
learn.body: 在那之前，继续探索河流并定期回来查看指导练习课程、发音技巧和文化见解。

gemChaser.name: 宝石追逐者
gemChaser.summary: 赢得奖励回合并收集河流宝石。

badge.title: Daily badge
badge.starsReady: You have +{{stars}} ⭐ ready across completed quests.
badge.finishQuests: Finish quests to unlock their star rewards.

warmup.title: Warm-Up
warmup.description: Play two quick runs to stir the current.

spice.title: Spice
spice.description: Win a round with the {{constraint}} active.

wordRiver.title: Word River
wordRiver.subtitle: Build each word and connect it with its meaning.

instructions.letters: Drag drifting letters into each bucket to build the word in your practice language.
instructions.match: Drag the completed words to the emoji or meaning that matches.

notifications.roundComplete: Round complete! New words are on the way.
